title: PSBs to integrate data and analytics into HR processes
description: State-run banks will embark on a government-approved reform agenda for fiscal 2025 focusing on data-driven human resource strategies, including manpower planning, succession planning, and productivity improvements. Key initiatives include integrating data analytics into HR processes, enhancing succession planning with profile matching, and promoting gender diversity, particularly in senior management roles.
